# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# user-specific files
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Ignore build results
bin/
obj/
[Ll]og/
*.log

# Ignore NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
*.nuspec
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# Ignore .NET Core
*.db
*.pdb
*.cache
*.deps.json

# Ignore Rider files
.idea/

# Ignore Visual Studio Code settings
.vscode/

# Ignore ReSharper files
*.DotSettings.user

# Ignore test results
TestResults/
*.trx
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Ignore generated files
Generated\_Files/

# Ignore Mac system files
.DS_Store

# Ignore Windows thumbnails
Thumbs.db
